text: Madison County is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 52,913 people lived there. The county seat and largest city is Rexburg. == Communities == === Cities === * Rexburg * Sugar City === Unincorporated communities === * Archer * Burton * Thornton == References == Category:1913 establishments in Idaho Category:Idaho counties
title: Madison County, Idaho
